table_of_contents.title: Introduction : the western way of war / Geoffrey Parker

The age of stone fortifications. On Roman ramparts 300-1300 / Bernard S. Bachrach ; New weapons, new tactics 1300-1500 / Christopher Allmand ; The gunpowder revolution 1300-1500 / Geoffrey Parker
